---
title: Get coordinates of route {{ from }} to {{ to }} 
output: github_document
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(routes)
library(here)
```

```{r}
start <- "{{{ from }}}"
end <- "{{{ to }}}"
```

```{r}
route_lat_lon <- get_route(start, end)
```
A quick check:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolylines(~ lon, ~ lat, data = route_lat_lon)
```

Save for later:
```{r}
route_lat_lon %>% 
  write_rds(here("{{{ shortname }}}", "route_coords.rds")) %>% 
  write_csv(here("{{{ shortname }}}", "route_coords.csv"))
```
